fields_of_interest: Consumers, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Climate Action, Communication
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Protection of consumers rights mainly in the energy field. 
Education of consumers, teaching adults. 
Assistance to local communities mainly these in apartment blocks. 
Consumers surveys. 
Advocacy for consumers in courts. 
Energy efficiency in buildings: feasibility studies, energy audits. 
Drafting proposals on legislation important for consumers.
relevant_communication:
Intelligent Energy Europe funded project "Top Ten" since 2009 (Swiss leader, 21 partner) 
Set up of 10 information centres. 
Drafting legal documents on strengthening management of apartment blocks.
